key.name: show-source
key.description: Display the source of the hadith (Bukhari, Muslim, etc.)

key.name: show-narrator
key.description: Display who narrated the hadith (Companion name)

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: Time in minutes between hadith changes (5 min - 24 hours)

key.name: position-x
key.description: X coordinate of hadith display on desktop

key.name: position-y
key.description: Y coordinate of hadith display on desktop

key.name: max-width
key.description: Maximum width of hadith display in pixels (400-2000)

key.name: arabic-background-color
key.description: Background color for Arabic text in hex format (default: darker gray)

key.name: background-opacity
key.description: Opacity of the background (0.0 = transparent, 1.0 = opaque)

key.name: arabic-color
key.description: Color for Arabic text in hex format (default: gold)

key.name: turkish-color
key.description: Color for Turkish text in hex format (default: white)

key.name: english-color
key.description: Color for English text in hex format (default: sky blue)

key.name: german-color
key.description: Color for German text in hex format (default: light green)

key.name: french-color
key.description: Color for French text in hex format (default: plum)

key.name: source-color
key.description: Color for source and narrator information (default: silver)

key.name: always-on-top
key.description: Keep hadith display above all windows (default: false, stays on desktop)
